summary: A German corporate headhunter travels to Houston, Texas, in pursuit of a renowned oil company CEO, only to have his life fall apart.
cast: Ulrich Tukur|Garret Dillahunt|Jenny Schily|Wolfram Koch|Jason Douglas|Jens Münchow|Jennifer Almaguer|Edgar Arreola|Julin|Ricky Catter|Scottie Jefferies|Rocfielle Living|Kasey James|Cheryl Stell|Maurizio Magno|Caroline Schreiber|Alexis Schvartzman|Maik Richter|Klaas Vogel|Femi Osagie|Hadeed Ahmed|Liz Ames|Alex Anderson|Ann Elizabeth Arnett|Sascha Brungs|Alfred Castillo Jr.|Stephen Charba|Yorck Dippe|Nicky Luera|Andreas Lukas|Marta Martin|Louisa Riofrio|Guido Schurmann|David Sharp|Ashley Stern|Georgette Trevino|Blaze Tucker
title: Houston
